summary: KFC, short for Kentucky Fried Chicken, is a popular American fast-food chain known for its fried chicken. Founded by Colonel Harland Sanders during the Great Depression, it became one of the world's biggest restaurant chains, with over 30,000 locations in 150 countries. KFC popularized chicken in the fast-food industry and was one of the first to expand globally. Its secret recipe, with 11 herbs and spices, is a trade secret. Besides fried chicken, KFC offers sandwiches, wraps, and side dishes. It's owned by Yum! Brands, which also owns Pizza Hut and Taco Bell.
title: KFC
